Package org.mbild.mbwatch

Class WatchBaseFactory

java.lang.Object
org.mbild.mbwatch.WatchBaseFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICSVSerializable
public class WatchBaseFactory extends Object implements ICSVSerializable
A factory for creating basic and functional clocks.
Author:
Matthias Bild
